OWASP Threat Dragon

Threat Dragon comes in two variants, desktop application and web application.

Web application

The web application can be run locally or from a server, and is downloaded from the Threat Dragon repo. There is some configuration necessary, so see the install instructions for configuring the application.

Desktop application

Installable versions are available for download from the OWASP GitHub area:

  • Windows (64 bit) installer
  • MacOS installer
  • Linux snap, AppImage, debian and rpm installers

See the detailed install instructions.
